mapper.select: select pc.parts_code_no, pc.parts_type_no, pc.parts_name, pt.parts_type from (select parts_code_no, parts_type_no, parts_name from parts_codes where usable = true) pc join parts_types pt on pc.parts_type_no = pt.parts_type_no where pt.usable = true

select parts_no, pc.parts_type_no, pt.parts_type, p.parts_code_no, pc.parts_name, parts_prices, working_prices, working_hours, units from parts p join parts_codes pc on p.parts_code_no = pc.parts_code_no join parts_types pt on pc.parts_type_no = pt.parts_type_no where pc.usable = true

select count(*) from parts p join parts_codes pc on p.parts_code_no = pc.parts_code_no join parts_types pt on pt.parts_type_no = pc.parts_type_no where pc.usable = "1" and pt.usable = "1" order by parts_no
